name: KeyTronic 2MOUSEU1L Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [This optical mouse will glide across your desk without having to use a mouse pad.  It can be used on almost any surface because it uses sensors to record the movement optically.  With no mouse ball, there are no parts to get dirty, so cleaning is a snap., This mouse is easy to use and ergonomically shaped to fit comfortably in your hand.  The scroll wheel makes navigating through documents and the internet easier and quicker.]
